title: Predicting Forest Fires in Algeria
short description: Analyzed wildfire data and built ML models to predict fire risks.
description: Explored forest fire datasets with R, uncovering patterns through data visualization and statistical analysis. Built and evaluated machine learning models to predict fire occurrences and highlight key risk factors.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
short description: Responsive portfolio website to showcase my work.
description: Designed and built a personal portfolio with React and Tailwind CSS. The site includes sections for projects, skills, and contact, with a clean and easy-to-navigate layout.

title: Agrobot â€“ AI & Systems Integration
description: Developed a ROS2-based system in C++ and Python for live video streaming and ML inference. Optimized preprocessing, messaging, and deployment with Docker and TensorRT to enable real-time crop detection and robotic spraying.

title: Parallel Programming Course Project
description: Implemented algorithms in Erlang and CUDA-enabled C++ to achieve large performance gains over sequential versions.

title: Distributed Systems Course Project
short description: RPC and consensus system in Go.
description: Built an RPC framework for distributed communication with vector clocks for causal ordering and Raft for consensus. Automated testing with bash scripts for multi-node execution.

title: Crochet Pattern 3D Simulator
short description: Turn crochet patterns into 3D interactive models.
description: Creating a Three.js web simulator that brings crochet patterns to life as 3D fabric structures. Parse pattern instructions into a 3D representation of the project.

title: Image Filter for Nuke
short description: Custom stylistic image filters for Nuke.
description: Implemented a Kuwahara filter with polynomial weighting for stylistic effects. Enhanced with Canny edge detection and validated performance through Pytest.

title: Agentic AI Workflows
short description: Built AI workflows with OAuth and ETL pipelines.
description: Integrated OAuth 2.0 with Google Auth in a Next.js app, managed secrets on Vercel, and developed ETL workflows with n8n and OpenAI agents. Improved data access, accuracy, and session management with custom middleware.

title: Financial Tracker App
description: Developed a MERN stack app to track spending, with predictive insights powered by Simple Exponential Smoothing.

title: Resume Parser
description:
I didn't want to pay for tokens, so I tried using Ollama instead. 

Uses Docker for easy deployment. The FastAPI backend uses Pydantic for data validation and connects to a PostgreSQL database to store parsed resume data. The TypeScript React frontend allows users to upload resumes and view parsed results in a user-friendly interface.

title: Perforce Deployment on AWS
short description: Set up Perforce on AWS for Unreal projects.
description: Deployed Perforce on AWS to enable collaborative game development in Unreal Engine. Cut storage costs by 50% by optimizing AWS volume provisioning.
